channel.title: Extracts on Arc
channel.description: Recent content in Extracts on Arc

item.title: Extract
item.description: *Extract stages read in data from a database or file system. *Extract stages should meet this criteria: Read data from local or remote filesystems and return a DataFrame. Do not transform/mutate the data. Allow for Predicate Pushdown depending on data source. AvroExtract The AvroExtract stage reads one or more Apache Avro files and returns a DataFrame. Parameters Attribute Type Required Description name String true Name of the stage for logging.
